page.title: 13QUALITY OF THE ENVIRONMENT
page.content: HAVING SURVEYED PARENTS AND CHILDRENS OPINIONS ON THE QUALITY OF OUR LOCAL ENVIRONMENT SOME INTERESTING GENERALIZATIONS AROSE.{PARENTS}WERE MUCH MORE CONTENT AND HAPPY WITH THE LOCAL AREA THAN CHILDREN, FEELING THAT THE OVERALL QUALITY WAS{SATISFACTORY {WHILE CHILDREN THOUGHT IT WAS POOR.} GENERAL DISSATISFACTION WAS FOUND IN THE PROVISION OF TRANSPORT SERVICES, THE EXTENT TO WHICH FOOTPATHS ARE FOULED BY DOGS AND THE AMOUNT OF LITTER PRESENT. HOWEVER, THERE WAS GENERAL AGREEMENT THAT PEOPLES OWN PROPERTY WAS WELL MAINTAINED, GARDENS, HOUSE-PAINTWORK ETC. CHILDREN, WHO WOULD NOT HAVE THE FINANCIAL PROBLEMS CONNECTED WITH THE IMPROVEMENT OF THE AREA, THOUGHT IT POOR THAT MANY ASPECTS FOUND IN NORWICH WERE SADLY LACKING IN HORSFORD, STREET LIGHTING, A POLICE STATION ETC.
